com.mashery.http.io

Interface ContentProducer


  • public interface ContentProducer
    Provides the means of producing outbound message body content.
    Restriction
    This interface is not intended to be implemented by clients.
    Restriction
    This interface is not intended to be extended by clients.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getContentLength()
      Returns the length of content that will be produced, in bytes, or -1 if unknown.
      boolean isRepeatable()
      Returns true if this producer can produce content more than once.
      void writeTo(OutputStream out)
      Writes the content into the given output stream.

    • Method Detail

      • getContentLength

        long getContentLength()
        Returns the length of content that will be produced, in bytes, or -1 if unknown.
        Returns:
        length of content that will be produced, in bytes, or -1 if unknown

      • writeTo

        void writeTo(OutputStream out)
             throws IOException
        Writes the content into the given output stream. Implementers should leave the stream open when done. Generally, implementers are not required to support repeated invocations of this method.
        Parameters:
        out - output stream into which to write the produced content
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error while writing out the content

      • isRepeatable

        boolean isRepeatable()
        Returns true if this producer can produce content more than once.
        Returns:
        true if this producer can produce content more than once
